Package org.siframework.abbi.atom

This package defines an interface to an Atom feed, and provides utilities to convert an Atom feed to and from XML, and to (and eventually from) JSON formats.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Category Implements the interface to a Category in an Atom Feed HL7 V3 and XDS use four parts to describe a coded element, including a code (term), display name (label), code system OID (scheme) and code system name (text).
Entry Implements the interface to a Entry in an Atom Feed

XMLMarshaller A utility class to convert Feeds to XML and back.
 

Package org.siframework.abbi.atom Description

This package defines an interface to an Atom feed, and provides utilities to convert an Atom feed to and from XML, and to (and eventually from) JSON formats. The JSON format used is that specified by the HL7 FHIR section on JSON Bundles. JSON Conversion uses the Google Gson library.

See Also:
The ATOM Syndication Format, JSON Bundles, Google Gson
